tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  album_id INT,
  song_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE songs (
    song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    song_name VARCHAR(255),
    album_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE songs (
  song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  song_name VARCHAR(100),
  album_id INT,
  artist_name VARCHAR(100),
  duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  entity_id INT,
  review_type VARCHAR(20),
  rating INT,
  review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE songs (
  song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  song_name VARCHAR(255),
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  album_id INT,
  length INT,
  genre VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  album_id INT,
  rating INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  album_id INT,
  reason TEXT,
  recommendation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE songs (
  song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  song_name VARCHAR(255),
  duration INT,
  album_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (album_id) REFERENCES albums(album_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  album_id INT,
  rating INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (album_id) REFERENCES albums(album_id)
);

CREATE TABLE song_ratings (
  rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  song_id INT,
  rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (song_id) REFERENCES songs(song_id)
);
